mapper.select: SELECT sm.`permission` FROM sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sur.`role_id` = srm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.`menu_id` = sm.`id` WHERE sur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND sm.`permission` != ''
SELECT sm.`permission` FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.`permission` IS NOT NULL AND sm.`permission` != ''
